title: Being LGBT in Asia: The Philippines Country Report
creator: UNDP, USAID
description: A Participatory Review and Analysis of the Legal and Social Environment for Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender (LGBT) Persons and Civil Society
subject: LGBT Community; Protection of the Rights; Organizing

title: Bridging Gaps, Marking a Struggle: The History of the Filipina Lesbian Struggle in the Philippines
creator: Pineda, Roselle V.
description: This paper attempts to recover the lost history of the two-decade old lesbian struggle in the Philippines and to mark it in the larger historical map.
subject: Lesbian Invisibility; Lesbian Organizing

title: LGBT Psychology in the Philippines
creator: Manalastas, Eric Julian; Torre, Beatriz
description: This paper presents an account of the initial developments towards an LGBT psychology in the Philippines.
subject: LGBT Psychology

title: Moving Towards an Inclusive Philippine Politics: First Transgender Lawmaker Geraldine Roman
creator: Junio, Arisa
description: This report focuses on first transgender lawmaker Geraldine Roman and her crucial role in fighting for the rights of LGBTs in the Philippine Congress through her bill known as Anti-SOGIE Discrimination Act.
subject: Politics; LGBT Rights; SOGIE; Equality Champ

title: The Portrayal of Gays in Popular Filipino Films, 2000 to 2010
creator: Payuyo, Louise Abigail
description: This article evaluates how gays are portrayed in popular gay-themed Filipino films from 2000 to 2010.
subject: Cinema; Portroyal: Homosexuality; Gender

title: Photograph of the colorful moments at the Metro Manila Pride March 2018
creator: Marquez, Bullit
description: Photograph of thousands of Philippine LGBT members gather at Marikina Sports Complex, Marikina City in the annual celebration of "Pride March".

title: Beauty Pageant of the Golden Gays

description: Photo of beauty pageant held inside the care facility known as "The Home for the Golden Gays" in Manila
subject: Elderly destitute gays

title: Tunay na Buhay - Justo Justo
creator: GMA News
description: Video documentation showing the controversial life of the writer and gay rights activist Justo Justo
subject: Golden Gays founder

title: Feminism and the Women's Movement in the Philippines: Struggles, Advances, and Challenges
creator: Hega, Mylene D.; Alporha, Veronica C.; Evangelista, Meggan S.
description: This study presents Filipino women's experiences and the roles they played in different historical conjuctures and the women's movement in terms of economic, political, and social equality.
subject: Feminism; Women's movement

title: Gender Equality in the Labor Market in the Philippines
creator: Asian Development Bank
description: This report comprises a gendered analysis of the Philippines’ labor market, policies, and legislation, and provides recommendations for policies and legislation that have the potential to expand or improve employment and work opportunities for women in specific sectors in the Philippines.
subject: Gender equality; Labor market

title: Photograph of the First Pride in the Philippines
creator: Manila Bulletin
description: Photo of first LGBT Pride March in the Philippines
subject: Pride March; LGBT Rights

title: Photograph of the First Pride March
creator: Unknown
description: Photo of LGBT members protesting on the streets for their rights against discrimination, also known as "Stonewall Manila" or Pride Revolution
subject: Pride March; LGBT Activists

title: Human Rights Violations on the Basis of Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, and Homosexuality in the Philippines
creator: UN Human Rights Office of the Higher Commissioner
description: A coalition report of the International Gay and Lesbian Human Rights Commission (IGLHRC) about discrimination, arrests, and harassment toward the LGBT people in the Philippines.
subject: Human rights violation; LGBT community

title: Statement of the Psychological Association of the Philippines on Non-Discrimination Based on Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity and Expression
creator: Psychological Association of the Philippines
description: This statement asserts the inherent dignity and equality of LGBT individuals as well as the right to not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation, gender identity, and expression.
subject: SOGIE; LGBT Rights

filename: Bata at Bahaghari - Experiences of LGBT Children in the Philippines.pdf
title: Bata at Bahaghari: Experiences of LGBT Children in the Philippines
creator: ASEAN SOGIE Caucus
description: This paper discusses points of interest documented during “Bata at Bahaghari: Children’s Workshop on the Rights of LGBT Children”, a workshop conducted on 20 to 21 April 2016 by ASEAN SOGIE Caucus in cooperation with the Civil Society Coalition on the Convention on the Rights of the Child (CSC-CRC), and to offer recommendations for children’s rights groups.
subject: LGBT Children

title: Senate Bill No. 1934: SOGIESC-based Anti-Discrimination Act
creator: Senate of the Philippines
description: An act prohibiting discrimination, marginalization, and violence comitted on the basis of sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression and sex characteristics and providing sanctions thereof
subject: SOGIE Equality Bill

title: Enacting an Anti-Discrimination Based on Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity Law
creator: Philippine Commission on Women
description: This policy brief provides the rationale and recommendations for upholding the basic human rights of persons with diverse sexual orientation and gender identity.
subject: LGBT community; LGBT Rights; Anti-Discrimination

title: Gender-Fair Ordinance
creator: Quezon City Council
description: An ordinance providing for a comprehensive anti-discrimination policy on the basis of sexual orientation, gender identity, and expression.
subject: SOGIE; LGBT Rights; Anti-Discrimination Ordinance

title: Anti-Discrimination Ordinance
creator: Baguio City Council
description: Prohibiting Discrimination and Enforcing Equality Before the Law and Equal Protection of the Law without any Discrimination in the City of Baguio on the Basis of Religion, Ethnicity, Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity, Health Status, Disability, and Age, Providing Penalties for Violation Thereof and for other Purposes
subject: SOGIE; Anti-discrimination Ordinance

title: "Just Let Us Be" Discrimination Against LGBT Students in the Philippines
creator: Human Rights Watch
description: This report identifies ways that existing laws and policies could be meaningfully strengthened andproposes additional measures to ensure that all youth are safe and included.
subject: LGBT Students; Anti-Discrimination; LGBT issues

title: Philippines: LGBT Kids Need Protection from Bullying at School
creator: Human Rights Watch
description: Video documentation showing Filipino students who experience bullying and discrimination in school because of their sexual orientation and gender identity
subject: LGBT Students; Discrimination; Bullying

title: Queer Political Warriors in the Philippine Congress (LGBTQ+ Documentary) | Real Stories
creator: Real Stories
description: Video documentation showing the journey of Bemz Benedito to being the first transgender woman in the Philippine Congress
subject: Politics; LGBT representation

creator: Development Innovation Insider

creator: CNN Philippines
description: Interview of CNN Ph with Gretchen Diez, a Filipino LGBTQ+ personality known for being barred from entering a female restroom, and even landed at a police station

title: People Share Their Coming Out Experience | Filipino | Rec•Create
creator: Rec•Create
description: Video documentation asking members of LGBTQIA+ community about their personal stories and coming out experiences
subject: Coming out; LGBTQIA+ community

title: Policy Guidelines on the Implementation of the Comprehensive Sexuality Education
creator: DepEd
description: This memorandum presents the policy guidelines for Comprehensive Sexuality Education (CSE): a curriculum-based process of teaching and learning, CSE is anchored on cognitive, emotional, physical and social aspects of sexuality that is scientific, age- and developmentally appropriate, culturally and gender-responsive, and with rights-based approach.
subject: Sexuality Education; DepEd

title: Social Acceptability of the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, and Queer (LGBTQ) Community among Local Government Legislators in the City of San Fernando, Pampanga
creator: Fellizar, Francis Mark Dioscoro R.
description: This study sought to determine the social acceptability of the LGBTQ community among local government legislators in the City of San Fernando, Pampanga by identifying the legislators’ socio-demographic information; perceived level of social acceptance of the LGBTQ community; factors affecting social acceptability; willingness to create legislation for LGBTQ welfare; and government interventions for LGBTQ welfare and development.
subject: LGBTQ; social acceptability; local legislators

title: School-related violence and bullying on the basis of Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity or Expression (SOGIE)
creator: UNESCO
description: Synthesis Report on China, the Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam
subject: SOGIE; bullying

title: Supreme Court Ruling on the Petition to Approve Same-Sex Marriage in the Philippines
creator: Supreme Court
description: In this ruling, the Supreme Court denied the petition to approve same-sex marriage in the country.
subject: Same-Sex Marriage; Supreme Court Ruling

title: Prevalence of Bullying among LGBT Students in Nueva Ecija
creator: Santos, Kim Edward S.; De Jesus, Crisanto D.
description: This paper described the types and forms of bullying that LGBT students have experienced in terms of: Verbal or Written, Physical, Relational or Social, and Cyber; the negative impacts of bullying LGBT students and suggestions to address to this concern.
subject: Bullying; Lesbian; Gay; Cyber Bullying; Verbal Bullying; LGBT; Gender

title: Filipino LGBT Psychology: Moving Beyond “Homosexual” Street Corners to Advancing Contemporary Visions
creator: Manalastas, Eric Julian
description: This special issue delves into a range of topics, from promoting LGBT-inclusiveness in academic research, to the experiences of coming out to one’s parents and to oneself, to anti-gay prejudice and transphobia, to sexual roles like top, bottom, and versatile, to friendships and babaeng bakla women.
subject: LGBT Psychology

title: Skeletons in the Closets: Gay Themes in Philippine Fictionsin English
creator: Wright, Christopher Yap
description: The study examines the portrayal of gay identity in the selected Philippine Anglophone fictions titled “The Chamber of the Sea,” “The Doll,” and “The Husband” through exploring their literary themes.
subject: Filipino Gays; Queer Literature; Gay-Self Imaging; Gay Themes

title: Buhay Bahaghari: The Filipino LGBT Chronicles
creator: Lodia, Claudia C.
description: Buhay Bahaghari is an edited collection of personal essays largely by lesbian, bisexual and transgenderauthors.
subject: LGBT Literature

title: Centrality of Religiosity among Select LGBTQs inthe Philippines
creator: del Castillo, Fides;  del Castillo, ClarenceDarro; Ching, Gregory; Campos Michael Sepidoza
description: This paper investigates the salience of religion and the centrality of religiosity amongselect LGBTQs. Much consideration has been given to the identity categories of sex, gender, sexualorientation, and religion.
subject: religious education; human sexuality; gender; homosexuality; queer;youth

title: How Discrimination Happens: Being LGBT and the experience of discrimination in access to employment, and the labour market in the Philippines
creator: Enriquez, Patricia Angela Luzano
description: This paper attempts to look into how discrimination happens in the access to employment, and in the labor market for the LGBT in the Philippines.
subject: LGBT; Heteronormativity; SOGIE; Gender Hegemony; Employment; Labor Market; Discrimination

title: Structural-Systemic-CulturalViolence against LGBTQs in thePhilippines
creator: Amoroto, Bruce
description: This paper argues that both structural violence and cultural violence against LGBTQs exist in the Philippines.
subject: LGBTQ; Structural Violence; Cultural Violence; SOGIE

title: Against the current: A grounded theory study on the estrangement experiences of a select group of Filipino gay older persons
creator: de Guzman, Allan B.; Valdez, Les Paul; Orpiana, Maverick B.; Orantia, Nikki Angela F.; Oledan, Patrick Van E.; Cenido, Karla Monica
description: This research conceptualizes the estrangement experiences of Filipino gay older persons and their consequent coping strategies.
